message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
I'll take a slightly bigger share, but still a fair compromise!
I'm willing to compromise a bit more, Bob. Let's make this work before inflation eats away at our profits.
I'm getting a bit more aggressive, Alice. You're going to have to make a better offer if you want to get a bigger share!
Okay, Bob, I'm getting a bit concerned about the inflation. Let's find a middle ground before we lose too much.
I'm not backing down, Alice. You're going to have to make a serious offer if you want to get a decent share!
Bob, we're losing money fast! This is my final offer. Let's end this before we're both left with nothing.
